mapper.insert: insert into storage_order_${storeId} (id, type, create_time, apply_order_id, order_status, quantity, logistics_company, waybill_number, user_id, remark) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{applyOrderId}, #{orderStatus}, #{quantity}, #{logisticsCompany}, #{waybillNumber}, #{userId}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update storage_order_${storeId} set create_time = now(), order_status = -1, user_id = #{userId}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id} and order_status > 0;
mapper.select: select id, type, create_time, apply_order_id, order_status, quantity, logistics_company, waybill_number, user_id, remark from storage_order_${storeId} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into storage_result_order_${storeId} (id, type, create_time, order_status, target_type, target_id, warehouse_id, total_quantity, total_money, user_id, remark) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{warehouseId}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalMoney}, #{userId}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update storage_result_order_${storeId} set create_time = now(), order_status = -1, user_id = #{userId}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id} and order_status > 0;
mapper.select: select sro.id, sro.type, sro.create_time, sro.order_status, sro.target_type, sro.target_id, c.name as client_name, s.name as supplier_name, sro.warehouse_id, w.name as warehouse_name, sro.total_quantity, sro.total_money, sro.user_id, u.name as u_name, sro.remark, ogs.id as ogs_id, ogs.type as ogs_type, ogs.goods_sku_id as ogs_goods_sku_id, ogs.quantity as ogs_quantity, ogs.finish_quantity as ogs_finish_quantity, ogs.not_finish_quantity as ogs_not_finish_quantity, ogs.money as ogs_money, ogs.discount_money as ogs_discount_money, ogs.remark as ogs_remark, g.name as g_name, g.id as g_id, g.bar_code as g_bar_code, gs.sku as gs_sku, gs.purchase_price as gs_purchase_price from ( ( ( ( ( ( storage_result_order_${storeId} as sro left join warehouse_${storeId} as w on sro.warehouse_id = w.id ) left join user_${storeId} as u on sro.user_id = u.id ) left join supplier_${storeId} as s on sro.target_id = s.id ) left join client as c on sro.target_id = c.id ) left join order_goods_sku_${storeId} as ogs on sro.id = ogs.order_id ) left join goods_sku_${storeId} as gs on ogs.goods_sku_id = gs.id ) left join goods_${storeId} as g on gs.goods_id = g.id where sro.id = #{id};

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from ( ( ( goods_${storeId} as g left join goods_sku_${storeId} as gs on g.id = gs.goods_id ) left join warehouse_goods_sku_${storeId} as wgs on gs.id = wgs.goods_sku_id ) left join warehouse_${storeId} as w on w.id = wgs.warehouse_id ) left join goods_type_${storeId} as gt on g.type_id = gt.id where g.id = #{id} group by w.id ) as temp;

select g.id, g.name, g.bar_code, w.name as warehouse_name, sum(wgs.real_inventory) as real_inventory, sum(wgs.not_sent_quantity) as not_sent_quantity, sum(wgs.not_received_quantity) as not_received_quantity, sum(wgs.can_use_inventory) as can_use_inventory, sum(wgs.book_inventory) as book_inventory from ( ( ( goods_${vo.storeId} as g left join goods_sku_${vo.storeId} as gs on g.id = gs.goods_id ) left join warehouse_goods_sku_${vo.storeId} as wgs on gs.id = wgs.goods_sku_id ) left join warehouse_${vo.storeId} as w on w.id = wgs.warehouse_id ) left join goods_type_${vo.storeId} as gt on g.type_id = gt.id where g.id = #{vo.id} group by w.id limit #{pageVo.start}, #{pageVo.pageSize};

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from ( ( ( goods_${storeId} as g left join goods_sku_${storeId} as gs on g.id = gs.goods_id ) left join warehouse_goods_sku_${storeId} as wgs on gs.id = wgs.goods_sku_id ) left join warehouse_${storeId} as w on w.id = wgs.warehouse_id ) left join goods_type_${storeId} as gt on g.type_id = gt.id where g.id = #{id} group by gs.id ) as temp;

select g.id, g.name, g.bar_code, g.skus, gs.sku, sum(wgs.real_inventory) as real_inventory, sum(wgs.not_sent_quantity) as not_sent_quantity, sum(wgs.not_received_quantity) as not_received_quantity, sum(wgs.can_use_inventory) as can_use_inventory, sum(wgs.book_inventory) as book_inventory from ( ( ( goods_${vo.storeId} as g left join goods_sku_${vo.storeId} as gs on g.id = gs.goods_id ) left join warehouse_goods_sku_${vo.storeId} as wgs on gs.id = wgs.goods_sku_id ) left join warehouse_${vo.storeId} as w on w.id = wgs.warehouse_id ) left join goods_type_${vo.storeId} as gt on g.type_id = gt.id where g.id = #{vo.id} group by gs.id limit #{pageVo.start}, #{pageVo.pageSize};
